Banner.Description: I have 1 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular, React, NodeJS and Javascript.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 1 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration covering frontend developer roles with Angular,Material UI,TypeScript. I have part of teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Associate Oracle Technical Consultant
Description: Results-driven Oracle Technical Consultant with experience in enhancing ERP systems and automating processes using Oracle Forms, SQL, PL/SQL, and Java.
Proven expertise in optimizing workflows, developing custom reports, and providing technical support across various Oracle modules.
Skilled in data migration, customization, and performance tuning.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend Developer
Description: Leverage proficiency in AngularJs, GSAP, Sass, Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript to build high-performance, visually stunning websites and web applications.
Partner with clients to understand their unique needs and translate them into user-centric, interactive experiences.
Possess strong problem-solving skills and a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest front-end development trends and technologies.
Committed to clear communication and collaboration throughout the development process.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer Intern
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Material, and Node.js, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer intern
Description: Developed and maintained web applications using Angular and React.
Coding of API requests with RxJS.
Creation of modules with complex reactive forms
Improved website performance by optimizing images
Collaborated with designers and back-end developers to create responsive and user-friendly web experiences

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Edubold
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This software aimed to streamline various administrative functions within educational institutes, including attendance tracking, library management, examination scheduling, fee collection, hostel management, asset management, finance management, accounting, and inventory management

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: AIO tools
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Website providing dashboard and tools to simplify tracking for small vendors.Provides a simple set of tools in form of an online dashboard. It would be able to help small and medium vendors to use and track their daily, monthly and yearly sales and growth easily in form of a graph and charts in just few clicks.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Netflix-Clone
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Netflix-Clone is a web app which is built using the 3rd Party Api integration. This app shows the list of series and movies from API and also has movies/series search,detailed description and you watch trailer of that movies/series.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Rock-Paper-Scissor Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Rock Paper game Made with ReactJs

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Movie Finding App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: App for finding Movie with Ionic Angular.In which Proper working of Search component and Movie Details component.API that used is from omdbapi

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Donart-Project
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: DONART is a social media site for donators, volunteers and help seekers.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: JWT Integration
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: JWT AUTHENTICATION IN NODE JS WITH POSTGREESQL DB

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
